scripts.build: npm run clean && sass src/clients/styles:.build/public/css && soundworks-build -b
scripts.dev: npm run build && (concurrently -i -p "none" "npm run watch:inspect server" "soundworks-build -b -w" "npm run watch:sass")
scripts.max:dev: npm run build && rm -R max/midi-mixer/javascript && mkdir max/midi-mixer/javascript && cp -R .build max/midi-mixer/javascript && cp -R public max/midi-mixer/javascript && cp -R config max/midi-mixer/javascript && esbuild ./src/server/index.js  --bundle --watch --format=cjs --platform=node --external:max-api --outfile=max/midi-mixer/javascript/midi-mixer.cjs
